body.p: Sir. I, take the liberty of addressing you ^this^ I. have served three years in the service of the U, S forces but on account of been deserving of promotion during that time i cannot get out of the service and i can get promoted in my own Regt but i refuse on account of my wife's health as for my caracter as a officer and and a soldier i would refer you to Col Hoskins. Eph Vanwinkle Otho Millis I. M. Ingram of Somerset

I understsand that there is State troops raising in Ky if it meets your approbation i would like very much to get an apointment in some of those 12 months organnastions as Major so as to be near my wife as she has not got long to live but I cannot get on detached duty here i have tried I hope you will excuse this from

your Humble
Servant
John Travis Capt
Co, B, 12 Ky, V, V, I,
1st Brigade 3d Divis
23 A. C. Decatur
Gen

12
Louisville Ky
Oct 4" 1864 --
Travis John
Capt Co. "B" 12" Ky V. I.
To The. Gov.
Desires an appointment as Major in some of the 12 months organizations -- Refers you to Col Hoskins, Eph Vanwinkle, Otho Miller & I. M. Ingram

L B No 7 -- 1864 P. 171
Recd A. G. O. Oct 5" 1864 --
